verses.verse: Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> seeing we have<WG2192> this<WG5026> ministry,<WG1248> as<WG2531> we have received mercy,<WG1653> we faint<WG1573> not;<WG3756>

But <WG235> have renounced<WG550> the<WG3588> hidden things<WG2927> of dishonesty,<WG152> not<WG3361> walking<WG4043> in<WG1722> craftiness,<WG3834> nor<WG3366> handling the word of God deceitfully;<WG1389> <WG3588> <WG3056> <WG2316> but<WG235> by manifestation<WG5321> of the<WG3588> truth<WG225> commending<WG4921> ourselves<WG1438> to<WG4314> every<WG3956> man's<WG444> conscience<WG4893> in the sight<WG1799> of God.<WG2316>
But <WG1161> if<WG1487> <WG2532> our<WG2257> gospel<WG2098> be<WG2076> hid,<WG2572> it is<WG2076> hid<WG2572> to<WG1722> them that are lost: <WG622>

In <WG1722> whom<WG3739> the<WG3588> god<WG2316> of this<WG5127> world<WG165> hath blinded<WG5186> the<WG3588> minds<WG3540> of them which believe not,<WG571> lest<WG3361> the<WG3588> light<WG5462> of the<WG3588> glorious<WG1391> gospel<WG2098> of Christ,<WG5547> who<WG3739> is<WG2076> the image<WG1504> of God,<WG2316> should shine<WG826> unto them.<WG846>

For <WG1063> we preach<WG2784> not<WG3756> ourselves,<WG1438> but<WG235> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> the Lord;<WG2962> and<WG1161> ourselves<WG1438> your<WG5216> servants<WG1401> for Jesus' sake.<WG1223> <WG2424>

For <WG3754> God,<WG2316> who commanded<WG2036> the light<WG5457> to shine<WG2989> out of<WG1537> darkness,<WG4655> hath<WG3739> shined<WG2989> in<WG1722> our<WG2257> hearts,<WG2588> to<WG4314> give the light<WG5462> of the<WG3588> knowledge<WG1108> of the<WG3588> glory<WG1391> of God<WG2316> in<WG1722> the face<WG4383> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>

But <WG1161> we have<WG2192> this<WG5126> treasure<WG2344> in<WG1722> earthen<WG3749> vessels,<WG4632> that<WG2443> the<WG3588> excellency<WG5236> of the<WG3588> power<WG1411> may be<WG5600> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> not<WG3361> of<WG1537> us.<WG2257>
We are troubled<WG2346> on<WG1722> every side,<WG3956> yet<WG235> not<WG3756> distressed;<WG4729> we are perplexed,<WG639> but<WG235> not<WG3756> in despair;<WG1820>
Persecuted, <WG1377> but<WG235> not<WG3756> forsaken;<WG1459> cast down,<WG2598> but<WG235> not<WG3756> destroyed;<WG622>

Always <WG3842> bearing about<WG4064> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> body<WG4983> the<WG3588> dying<WG3500> of the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> Jesus,<WG2424> that<WG2443> the<WG3588> life<WG2222> also<WG2532> of Jesus<WG2424> might be made manifest<WG5319> in<WG1722> our<WG2257> body.<WG4983>

For <WG1063> we<WG2249> which live<WG2198> are always<WG104> delivered<WG3860> unto<WG1519> death<WG2288> for Jesus' sake,<WG1223> <WG2424> that<WG2443> the<WG3588> life<WG2222> also<WG2532> of Jesus<WG2424> might be made manifest<WG5319> in<WG1722> our<WG2257> mortal<WG2349> flesh.<WG4561>
So then<WG5620> <WG3303> death<WG2288> worketh<WG1754> in<WG1722> us,<WG5213> but<WG1161> life<WG2222> in<WG1722> you.<WG2254>

<WG1161> We having<WG2192> the<WG3588> same<WG846> spirit<WG4151> of faith,<WG4102> according as<WG2596> it is written,<WG1125> I believed,<WG4100> and<WG2532> therefore<WG1352> have I spoken;<WG2980> we<WG2249> also<WG2532> believe,<WG4100> and<WG2532> therefore<WG1352> speak;<WG2980>

Knowing <WG1492> that<WG3754> he which raised up<WG1453> the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> shall raise up<WG1453> us<WG2248> also<WG2532> by<WG1223> Jesus,<WG2424> and<WG2532> shall present<WG3936> us with<WG4862> you.<WG5213>

For <WG1063> all things<WG3956> are for your sakes,<WG1223> <WG5209> that<WG2443> the<WG3588> abundant<WG4121> grace<WG5485> might through<WG1223> the<WG3588> thanksgiving<WG2169> of many<WG4119> redound<WG4052> to<WG1519> the<WG3588> glory<WG1391> of God.<WG2316>

For which cause<WG1352> we faint<WG1573> not;<WG3756> but<WG235> though<WG1499> our<WG2257> outward<WG1854> man<WG444> perish,<WG1311> yet<WG235> the<WG3588> inward<WG2081> man is renewed<WG341> day by day.<WG2250> <WG2532> <WG2250>

For <WG1063> our<WG2257> light<WG1645> affliction,<WG2347> which is but for a moment,<WG3910> worketh<WG2716> for us<WG2254> a far more exceeding<WG2596> <WG5236> <WG1519> <WG5236> and eternal<WG166> weight<WG922> of glory;<WG1391>

While we<WG2257> look not at<WG4648> <WG3361> the things which are seen,<WG991> but<WG235> at the things which are not seen:<WG991> <WG3361> for<WG1063> the things which are seen<WG991> are temporal;<WG4340> but<WG1161> the things which are not seen<WG991> <WG3361> are eternal.<WG166>
